alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Henderson, southwestern Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blue Goose, or 11 miles west of Lexington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Blue Goose, Parkers Crossroads, Darden, Bargerton, Wildersville, Clarksburg, Hickory Flat, Cedar Grove, Rock Hill, Union Cross, Juno, Timberlake, Palmer Shelter, Hinson Springs, Parker`s Cross Roads, Claybrook and Jumbo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
